title: Tripledemic ahead! New COVID, flu, RSV vaccines (and what's covered by insurance) | BenefitsPRO
author: Julie Appleby
description: Timing and cost of new vaccines vary by virus and health insurance status, but for COVID shots, including the updated ones expected to be available this fall, most people will still be able to get the vaccines for free.
